Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to authorizing angling by a single individual with up to three lines in freshwater
Summary: Relates to authorizing angling by a single individual with up to three lines in freshwater; extends effectiveness of provisions for two years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 455 of the laws of 2011 amending the environmental conservation law relating to authorizing angling by a single individual with up to three lines in freshwater, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
